html:
8.25.21  10:31 am   Do you have a music degree?

      what the heck is that, nevermind, no

8.25.21  10:04 am   What are some things that society should pay more attention to?

      other societies

8.25.21  10:01 am   what's a new method you've implemented to streamline the song production process?

      i will tell you after i find out if it works

8.25.21  8:21 am   Bill, why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

8.25.21  7:21 am   did you ever take actual music lessons and do you they're stupid

      music itself is infinite lessons

8.25.21  6:55 am   Do you think the world will any be better if Spain was in Greece?

      no, BUT, it also would not be any worse

8.25.21  6:53 am   how to be cool

      first you'll wanna go ahead and take an envelope and put it inside another envelope

8.25.21  5:32 am   Are you riding a pony into the sunset?

      yes but i'm actually getting further away from the sunset

8.25.21  5:24 am   how are you such a legend 

      i dropped myself on my head when i was young

8.25.21  5:10 am   favourite movie

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i'm trying to make new ones just in case

8.25.21  4:45 am   What is the strangest thing you've ever done in your career (so far)?

      was born

8.25.21  4:14 am   Opinions on today's popular music? 

      it has an amazingly recent release date

8.25.21  3:40 am   favorite animal?

      computer

8.25.21  3:25 am   I don't want to go to college. What should I do instead?

      start building your own college. it takes a long time to build a college so you might as well get started

8.25.21  1:11 am   in what case would you have to use the boats on the plane at the hotel where you're staying in case you have to swiftly get away?

      in bars 5 thru 8 of a song, for example

8.25.21  12:16 am   do you have a plan for a show or just ideas for now

      ideas

8.24.21  11:49 pm   Do you have a favorite song you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

8.24.21  11:46 pm   what makes people uncreative

      nothing

8.24.21  11:15 pm   how to make your video

      we'll see in a moment

8.24.21  10:25 pm   why is bread

      it is the lord's will

8.24.21  10:17 pm   do you write and/or storyboard your music videos or do you make them up as you go along?

      first i write the music, then i record the music. then i create the video. there is no writing process in between the finishing of the audio and the starting of the video. sometimes i feel there should be, but so far there never has been. nonetheless, it could be argued that a large percentage of the video is written when the song is written, because that's when all the words/music is written

8.24.21  10:14 pm   thoughts on the arrangement of keyboard keys

      it's pretty good

8.24.21  9:44 pm   Thoughts on 1993?

      prime

8.24.21  9:14 pm   Are you thinking of updating the reality page any time soon?

      yes

8.24.21  9:13 pm   I feel like doing everything but cant do everything. But still feel like doing something . What do I do

      start by making a list of things you might want to do. the bad news is you won't be able to list everything, which will make you feel weak, but, the good news is you will never run out of things to list, which will make you feel strong

8.24.21  8:58 pm   What's your favorite part of making music?

      it helps answer everything. especially things that are unanswerable

8.24.21  8:49 pm   are you secretly an iguana?

      i either don't know or can't tell you

8.24.21  8:40 pm   how do i make sense

      impossible. it can't be done

8.24.21  8:35 pm   How do you decide whether to answer one of these questions seriously and/or cryptically

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, seriousness is cryptic

8.24.21  8:30 pm   So I took your advice. Found out that a day is juuuust long enough for me to eat 3 meals and sleep peacefully. What next? 

      do it again!

8.24.21  8:14 pm   played an instrument in the violin family before?

      i don't think so

8.24.21  7:57 pm   what is your favorite song

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

8.24.21  7:27 pm   Are you always truthful

      sometimes i'm artful

8.24.21  6:46 pm   How long were you making music for before your voice became a part of the things you made? 

      at least a decade

8.24.21  6:46 pm   why do I always feel like walking?

      because walking is very nice

8.24.21  5:28 pm   earth is spinning?

      i'm trying to think of a counter argument to that, but i can't

8.24.21  5:04 pm   How did you discover your talent/songs?

      got way too happy

8.24.21  4:26 pm   why do you think there's any limit on the number of songs you can fit on an album

      in that case i suppose i don't understand what an album is

8.24.21  3:31 pm   what's your go-to piece in monopoly

      the thimble, but i have also never played monopoly

8.24.21  3:30 pm   Is it a bad thing if a song requires the music video to have its full meaning?

      fullness of meaning often comes from both audio and video. when there's no video, the listener will almost always find other visual things to ground the meaning of the audio. whether they are staring at some kind of songtitle image for the song, or maybe looking out at the world going on around them

8.24.21  2:56 pm   When do you do a thing that does things? 

      getting ready to do that in just a couple of moments

8.24.21  2:38 pm   How do you slow something off a wall?

      it's a metaphor for going totally wild

8.24.21  2:35 pm   the color scheme for this website is damn near perfect, other than the lyrics page. (why is the lyrics page background such a bold satanic red?)

      this is to make sure you don't spend too much time there, just reading the lyrics without the music

8.24.21  2:23 pm   favorite type of pizza 

      perfect

8.24.21  1:41 pm   what would happen if, hypothetically, the day were to not go on in "and the day goes on"

      what i would do is: delete the last line of the first stanza ("and, i don't think that anything's gone wrong"), and replace it with "oh, i don't think i'm gonna be going home", and end the song right there

8.24.21  12:42 pm   Do you think that there are alternate realities where every decision we make in this reality creates an alternate reality where we made a different decision?

      yes

8.24.21  11:29 am   Are there any non-music related topics you have a particular interest in?

      yes, 'everything'

8.24.21  10:44 am   Can i tell a joke to you?

      sure

8.24.21  8:52 am   how do you dismiss the fact that life is marching us towards the death itself

     start by making a diagram of how much time you think you might have, and see if you can figure out the way you would most like to use it

      and nothing will really matter in the end of the destructive nature of the universe

     that part seems easy to dismiss because it sounds super fake

8.24.21  8:19 am   is christmas real

      yes, despite its best efforts to be fake
